channel.title: angular on The art of BEEP-BOOPing
channel.description: Recent content in angular on The art of BEEP-BOOPing

item.title: From 1k to 100
item.description: What is this? This is the story of how an ugly little duckling slow machine learning web-app grew up to be a beautiful swan fast front-end-only application. The setting Once upon a time, in a country far far away, two software developers were instructed to improve a front end only web application capable to perform numbers recognition on photos. I happen to be one of those two developers ‘o’. The initial requirements for the application were simple:
